0: E Amazing gym setup as well weights elipticals tread mills fresh towels
The accommodations were satisfactory but the value and location encourages a return to the hotel
The facility appears to offer ample conference room space if needed and the gym area is well equipped
I like the fact that you need your room key to access the elevators the hotel is very clean and worth the price of the rooms
It has an entrance directly onto 16th street AKA 16th street mall
The hotel has a small business centre in the main lobby that is easy to use a small store with snacks and the like with typical hotel markups and a small boutique my partner did some shopping in
Location comfort amenities in room iron microwave coffee fridge staff let us check in a little early
The facility is beautifully furnished with a large and inviting lobby
This property has an Embassy Suites feel with the open lobby
1: Yes I understand the lobby is under renovation and I am okay with that
Have a coffee bar in the lobby
We were working all day so the lobby noise did not bother us
2: Unfortunately during my stay there was construction going on at the entrance to the hotel
No usb cord and accessories though
Our headphones along with usb cord and other accessories were missing from our room
The elevator has a weird layout
I was very disappointed in the room l received it had a noisy fan and it backed the elevator
I walked into the lobby to check in the clerk asked my name and he said Oh good your sons been waiting for you
From the first visit5 years ago we could smell a sewer smell when coming into the hotel lobby from the valet parking area
Room was a bit claustrophobic and window was only overlooking atrium
We would go in circles from our rooms to the elevator if we were not paying attention
The rooms are quite loud being able to hear sound clearly from the hallway and floors above
